articles.description: The combination of nicotine, carbon monoxide, and free radicals can result in dullness, poor complexion, even cancer. But reversal of such damage is possible.
articles.content: When you smoke a cigarette, 5,000 harmful chemicals are released into your body. The innocuous-looking shisha or hookah also contains high levels of arsenic, lead, and nickel, if it isnt tobacco-base… [+7023 chars]
